data.title: Race Timing and Sporting Events
data.meta_description: ChampionChip Ireland is the sole operator of MyLaps chip timing in Ireland & Northern Ireland, providing timing solutions for sports events across the country.
data.text:
The right time, every time

ChampionChip Ireland has been providing timing solutions for events all over Ireland since 1999. We are the sole operators in Ireland of the world leading chip-timing technology, used at all the major active sports events all over the world.

Chip Timing

ChampionChip Ireland provides timing and results solutions for sporting events anywhere in Ireland. We provide services to marathons, road races, cross country runs, triathlons and duathons, cycle races and cycle sportifs. ChampionChip Ireland uses the world leading Mylaps ChampionChip LF transponder system to accurately and reliably time athletes in a wide range of sports.
